July 1 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - CAPITAL MARKETS DAY AND TRADING UPDATE *AVEVA - GOOD START TO FY22, ACHIEVING APPROXIMATELY 10% REVENUE GROWTH IN FIRST TWO MONTHS OF FINANCIAL YEAR *AVEVA - GROUP TARGETS CONVERSION OF ADJUSTED NET PROFIT TO FREE CASH FLOW OF 100% ACROSS TARGET PERIOD


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 01-JUL-202106:00:04 GMT
